about_the_game:
This is a game mainly based on the gameplay of magical immortals eating chicken. Here, you will match a suitable lineup in each round, survive until the end, and choose different heroes to experience different gameplay. The game contains 8 types of elemental damage, and different heroes will also match different bond effects, bringing you powerful damage increases.

Game Features

  • 【Support for War】

In the game, you can recruit auxiliary characters at any time to form a match with your main battle character and trigger super powerful combination skills.

  • 【 Bonds 】

Heroes have a binding effect on each other, forming a suitable lineup and triggering the binding effect, making battles more profound and nurturing.

  • 【Hide and Seek】

The hide and seek system has been added, allowing you to take on various forms within the scene to evade the pursuit of other players, plot against them, or provide a safe environment for yourself to search for battle heroes.

  • 【Elemental Reaction】

The game has 8 types of elemental damage, and all 7 elements except physics can react with each other. Different elemental reactions have different negative effects on the target, which also affects your lineup selection.

  • 【The Great Demon King】

In the game, you can defeat the dragon beasts in the scene to obtain a dragon soul. The dragon soul will transform you into a great demon king, increasing your damage but also causing you to suffer higher damage. At this point, you will become the most prominent one on the field.

  • 【Evasion, blocking, floating pursuit, lightness skill】

Combat involves diverse ways of behavior, use them flexibly, and become a master of combat.

  • 【Rich PVE content】

A large amount of PVE content has been completed and will be presented to everyone in the future.
detailed_description:
PingCity, officially tested on PC

PingCity, officially tested on PC, join the player group and give us feedback

At present, the official player group has been opened, and first-hand information will be updated synchronously in the group. Internal testing and other welfare activities will be held, and there is also a chance to participate in the competition and win physical rewards such as JD cards. Welcome to join the discussion together, young heroes!

QQ Group: 342072404

name: 萍城异闻录

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225, AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, ATI Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K , AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 , AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

short_description: This is a different chicken eating game, where you can choose a main battle character to fight, defeat other players and monsters in the scene to earn currency, form your team lineup, and have rich combos to bring a different experience.
